page.title: 13EVERY DAY
page.content: at half past eight in the morning I stepped out of bed onto the carpet. I share my bedroom with my brother. My watch showed 8:30.I walked towards the bathroom and went on the toilet. Then I cleaned my hands in a sink, the water gushed out from a tap. I carefully dried my hands on a towel. I walked into the kitchen and got out a bowl and a spoon. I got the cream out of the fridge and fetched the cornflakes and sugar.After eating my breakfast I got out my clothes and went upstairs to clean my teeth.I walked into the bathroom and got out my toothbrush and put on some toothpaste by squeezing it out of a tube.
